definitions.text: a cue given to a performer (usually the beginning of the next line to be spoken)
examples: the audience could hear his prompting

definitions.text: (computer science) a symbol that appears on the computer screen to indicate that the computer is ready to receive a command

examples: This moved me to sacrifice my career

definitions.text: serve as the inciting cause of
examples: She prompted me to call my relatives

definitions.text: assist (somebody acting or reciting) by suggesting the next words of something forgotten or imperfectly learned
according to schedule or without delay; on time
ready and willing or quick to act
examples: she is always prompt to help her friends

definitions.text: performed with little or no delay
examples: an immediate reply to my letter
